channel.title: Server Start
channel.description: OK I have Port Forwarded and got the ip. I have downloaded the source and client richscape and have no clue wat to do from there. I have read the tutorial on making a server but i am confused. I need to kno what to do after i have port forwarded and downloaded the client and got an ip.

item.title: Server Start
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

oooooooo hang on let me look[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 05:03:08 am[/size][hr]ok fireweavor i did that and i double checked the port foward and its correct. now wat source should i use?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 05:20:18 am[/size][hr]ok so now i get this compile error tht says

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

and a PATH So make a PATH in System Variables and use the same value as in CLASSPATH
